languages.text: "Давайте-ка я вам объясню расклад. Во-он там стоят мои ребята с большой-пребольшой пушкой, которая отправит вас к {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} с одного пыха. Но я же не изверг какой-то, а?" {n}Мужчина паскудно усмехается.{/n} "Я вам должен предложить альтернативу. Альтернатива пыху такая — мои ребята прямо сейчас вас проводят в одну комнатушку по-соседству, где вы тихо-мирно посидите пару часов, пока я прощаюсь с моим другом Дензом... и получаю причитающуюся мне за дружбу долю наследства".

"Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."
languages.original_text: "Давайте-ка я вам объясню расклад. Во-он там стоят мои ребята с большой-пребольшой пушкой, которая отправит вас к {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} с одного пыха. Но я же не изверг какой-то, а?" {n}Мужчина паскудно усмехается.{/n} "Я вам должен предложить альтернативу. Альтернатива пыху такая — мои ребята прямо сейчас вас проводят в одну комнатушку по-соседству, где вы тихо-мирно посидите пару часов, пока я прощаюсь с моим другом Дензом... и получаю причитающуюся мне за дружбу долю наследства".

traits.locale_text: "Let me give you a rundown of the situation. See my boys over there? They've got this huge, nasty gun for you that's going to send you straight to the Emperor in one quick pop. But hey, I'm not a monster, eh?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta give you an alternative! And the alternative to the pop is this — my boys will escort you to a small, cozy room nearby where you will stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my friend Denz... and receive my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

But hey, I'm not a monster, eh?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta give you an alternative! And the alternative to the pop is this — my boys will escort you to a small, cozy room nearby where you will stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my friend Denz... and receive my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

languages.text: “我来告诉你这件事情会怎么结束吧。看到我那些小伙子了吗？看到他们的大炮了吗？那玩意会把你直接轰到{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}那里去——砰！不过我也不是杀人狂，你明白吧？”{n}他对你露出了令人厌恶的傻笑。{/n}“我至少得给你个选择才行！如果你不想变成烟花的话，就跟我的小伙子去附近某个舒适的小房间里，在里面等上一两个小时。在这段时间里，我会与我的老伙计丹兹道别……取走我应得的那份遗产。我和他做了这么多年的朋友，这是我应得的。”
languages.original_text: "Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

traits.locale_text: “我来告诉你这件事情会怎么结束吧。看到我那些小伙子了吗？看到他们的大炮了吗？那玩意会把你直接轰到{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}那里去——砰！不过我也不是杀人狂，你明白吧？”{n}他对你露出了令人厌恶的傻笑。{/n}“我至少得给你个选择才行！如果你不想变成烟花的话，就跟我的小伙子去附近某个舒适的小房间里，在里面等上一两个小时。在这段时间里，我会与我的老伙计丹兹道别……取走我应得的那份遗产。我和他做了这么多年的朋友，这是我应得的。”

languages.text: «Te voy a contar lo que va a pasar. ¿Ves a los muchachos? Ves esa arma descomunal que tienen? Te enviará directamente al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, ¡bum! Pero no soy un monstruo, ¿sabes?». {n}Te lanza una sonrisa socarrona y repugnante.{/n} «¡Te tengo que dar a elegir! Si no quieres volar, mis muchachos te escoltarán a una sala cercana y agradable donde puedes pasar un par de horas para que me despida de mi colega Denz... y me lleve mi parte de la herencia, todo lo que merezco por nuestros años de amistad».
languages.original_text: "Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

traits.locale_text: «Te voy a contar lo que va a pasar. ¿Ves a los muchachos? Ves esa arma descomunal que tienen? Te enviará directamente al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, ¡bum! Pero no soy un monstruo, ¿sabes?». {n}Te lanza una sonrisa socarrona y repugnante.{/n} «¡Te tengo que dar a elegir! Si no quieres volar, mis muchachos te escoltarán a una sala cercana y agradable donde puedes pasar un par de horas para que me despida de mi colega Denz... y me lleve mi parte de la herencia, todo lo que merezco por nuestros años de amistad».

languages.text: 「今あんたが置かれている状況を説明してやろう。俺の部下たちが向こうにいるだろう？でっかい銃を持ってるよなあ？あいつらをドカン！と放てばあんたはお空にいる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のところにひとっ飛びだ。だがな、俺だって鬼じゃない」{n}彼は嫌らしい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「あんたに選択肢をやるよ！空の星になりたくなけりゃあ、俺の部下たちが近くの過ごしやすい狭い部屋にあんたを案内して、俺が相棒のデンツに別れの挨拶をして…遺産をもらい、長年の友情の清算をするまで待ってもらう」
languages.original_text: "Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

traits.locale_text: 「今あんたが置かれている状況を説明してやろう。俺の部下たちが向こうにいるだろう？でっかい銃を持ってるよなあ？あいつらをドカン！と放てばあんたはお空にいる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のところにひとっ飛びだ。だがな、俺だって鬼じゃない」{n}彼は嫌らしい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「あんたに選択肢をやるよ！空の星になりたくなけりゃあ、俺の部下たちが近くの過ごしやすい狭い部屋にあんたを案内して、俺が相棒のデンツに別れの挨拶をして…遺産をもらい、長年の友情の清算をするまで待ってもらう」

languages.text: "Ich sage Euch jetzt, wie es läuft. Seht Ihr meine Jungs da drüben? Seht Ihr diese enorme Knarre? Die bläst Euch direkt zum {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} – bumm! Aber ich bin ja kein Monster." {n}Er setzt ein widerwärtiges Grinsen auf.{/n} "Ich muss Euch zumindest eine Wahl anbieten! Wenn Ihr nicht bumm machen wollt, begleiten meine Jungs Euch in einen kleinen, gemütlichen Raum in der Nähe, wo Ihr die nächsten ein oder zwei Stunden bleiben werdet, während ich mich von meinem Kumpel Denz verabschiede ... und meinen Anteil der Erbschaft einfordere, den ich nach jahrelanger Freundschaft auch verdiene."
languages.original_text: "Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sage Euch jetzt, wie es läuft. Seht Ihr meine Jungs da drüben? Seht Ihr diese enorme Knarre? Die bläst Euch direkt zum {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} – bumm! Aber ich bin ja kein Monster." {n}Er setzt ein widerwärtiges Grinsen auf.{/n} "Ich muss Euch zumindest eine Wahl anbieten! Wenn Ihr nicht bumm machen wollt, begleiten meine Jungs Euch in einen kleinen, gemütlichen Raum in der Nähe, wo Ihr die nächsten ein oder zwei Stunden bleiben werdet, während ich mich von meinem Kumpel Denz verabschiede ... und meinen Anteil der Erbschaft einfordere, den ich nach jahrelanger Freundschaft auch verdiene."

languages.text: « Laissez-moi vous expliquer ce qu'il va se passer. Vous voyez mes hommes, là-bas ? Vous voyez le gros canon ? Il est suffisamment puissant pour vous envoyer tout droit chez l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Boum ! Mais je ne suis pas un monstre ! {n}temporise-t-il avec un rictus répugnant.{/n} Je vais donc vous offrir un choix. Si vous ne voulez pas vous faire envoyer en orbite, mes hommes vous escorteront jusqu'à une petite pièce attenante où vous patienterez une heure ou deux, le temps que je fasse mes adieux à mon vieil ami Denz... et que je réclame ma part de l'héritage, que j'ai amplement méritée pour avoir passé toutes ces années à ses côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi vous expliquer ce qu'il va se passer. Vous voyez mes hommes, là-bas ? Vous voyez le gros canon ? Il est suffisamment puissant pour vous envoyer tout droit chez l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Boum ! Mais je ne suis pas un monstre ! {n}temporise-t-il avec un rictus répugnant.{/n} Je vais donc vous offrir un choix. Si vous ne voulez pas vous faire envoyer en orbite, mes hommes vous escorteront jusqu'à une petite pièce attenante où vous patienterez une heure ou deux, le temps que je fasse mes adieux à mon vieil ami Denz... et que je réclame ma part de l'héritage, que j'ai amplement méritée pour avoir passé toutes ces années à ses côtés. »

languages.text: "Şimdi olacakları söyleyeyim. Şurada duran adamlarımı görüyor musunuz? Ellerinde kocaman silah tutanlar. Onunla sizi doğrudan {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} fırlatabiliriz. Güm! Fakat ben canavar değilim." {n}İğrenç bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "En azından size bir seçenek sunacağım! Havaya uçmak istemiyorsanız adamlarım size bir iki saat kalacağınız minik ve rahat bir odaya kadar eşlik edecek. Ben de o sırada dostum Denz'e veda edip mirastan payımı, yıllar süren dostluğumuzun karşılığını alacağım."
languages.original_text: "Let me tell you how this is gonna go. See my boys over there? See that massive gun they've got? That'll blast you straight to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} — boom! But I'm not a monster, see?" {n}He gives you a disgusting smirk.{/n} "I gotta offer you a choice at least! If you don't want to go boom — my boys will escort you to a small, cosy room nearby where you'll stay for the next hour or two while I say my goodbyes to my pal Denz... and claim my share of the inheritance, everything I deserve for our years of friendship."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yapacağımızı ben açıklayayım. Şurada duran adamlarımı görüyor musunuz? Ellerindeki kocaman silahı görüyor musunuz? Onunla sizi doğrudan {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a fırlatacağız ve bum! Fakat ben bir canavar değilim." {n}İğrenç bir şekilde sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "En azından bir seçenek sunayım! Fırlatılmak istemiyorsanız ben dostum Denz'e veda edip mirastan hakkıma düşen payı ve yıllar süren dostluğumuzun karşılığını alırken adamlarım size bir iki saat kalacağınız minik ve rahat bir odaya doğru refakat edecek."
